# Warcrimes – conscription {#sec-warcrimes-conscription}

::: {.callout-caution title="Myth"}
The West sends mercenaries against Russia
[<br></br>![Search for topic in EUvsDisinfo](../all_common_img/EUvsDisinfo_400x240.jpg){height=2em}](https://euvsdisinfo.eu/disinformation-cases/?text=russia%20(conscripting%7Cconscription%7Cconscripts%7Cconscript%7Cmercenary%7Cmercenaries)&sort=relevance)
:::
  
::: {.callout-tip title="Truth"}
Russia forces Ukrainian civilans to fight against their homeland
:::
  
Russia coerces Ukrainians in the occupied territories to accept Russian passports,[^warcrimes-conscription-1] in order to forcibly recruit them for the war against their homeland, Ukraine.[^warcrimes-conscription-2]
